mapper.select: SELECT I.RATE_IMG_NO, R.REVIEW_NO, I.RATE_IMG_PATH, I.RATE_THUMB_PATH FROM RATE_IMG I, REVIEW R where R.REVIEW_NO = I.REVIEW_NO and R.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RATE_IMG( RATE_IMG_NO, REVIEW_NO, RATE_IMG_PATH, RATE_THUMB_PATH) VALUES (REVIEW_IMG_SEQ.nextval, #{reviewNo}, #{rateImgPath}, #{rateThumbPath} )
